name: NovaStella 2022
description:
Description: An astronaut stuck on an asteroid, and trying to get home. Your space helmet is cracked, and a mysterious creature by your side. Can you make it out alive?

Controls:

A: left

D: Right

Space: Jump

-star will fill in platforms automatically

-pick up oxygen tanks to refill!

Credits:

Aram C: Sound/Music Design

Arman A: Programming/Producer

Sean A: Programming/Level Design

Makenzie B:  Character Design/Art

Erika W: Environment Design/Art
